reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shirt fits well, with one noting it's long enough to cover the butt area, and appreciate its drop-down shoulder design that makes it sexy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well!
items.body: Very pretty shirt. It can easily be worn off the shoulder or more professional as a boat neck top. Light-weight T-shirt material and very comfy. I wanted a top that was more loose on top so it could drape off the shoulder. I went with my regular size Med and it fits great. More form-fitted around my waist. Read more
items.author: Cwallace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up!
items.body: I’m generally a curvy small. Size two. But 36DDD. 5’2; 140-145 lbs. I wanted this shirt to lounge in. And the deal of the day was in a size large. And I wanted a really oversized shirt. I’m sure the fit of the shirt has to do with my chest size. But it fits like a medium. It’s soft t-shirt material and has quite a bit of stretch to it so you don’t have to size up. I love the burnt orange color. It’s very fall appropriate. It isn’t super thick so can be layered but it is definitely not see thru. When I opened the package I really didn’t think I was going to like it. But after I put it on I loved it. It can be dressed up or down. Worn with leggings or jeans. It’s actually surprisingly figure flattering by the way the material lays and the longer waist sits on the hips. I will definitely be looking for a few more in different colors. Both sizes M and L are flattering and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Mensa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and fit
items.body: Comfortable and great fit Read more
items.author: Mai Reinhold

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice too like the picture
items.body: This shirt is beautiful but I should have sized done from a large to small. Only because of how o was wearing it. Fingers crossed I can shrink the 3 tops I purchased. Read more
items.author: La Tonya K. Franklin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: This top was perfect. The style and material was nice and soft and the fit was exactly what I wanted. I will be order a few other colors. Read more
items.author: STK

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size down
items.body: Really cute top. Does run a little large. The only thing I don’t like is that after wearing it one time the fabric is starting to pick making it look like a top that you’ve worn many times. Read more
items.author: Jennifer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: Absolutely love this. Fits amazing. Read more
items.author: Brandi Cunningham

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loose & comfy fit!
items.body: Love this top! It has a great fit, soft material and looks great with jeans or dress pants. I bought several colors! Read more
items.author: Kimberly Lynch

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Burnt Orange, Rust Orange, Army Green, Hot Pink, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Gray Blue, Dark Green, Red, Wine Red, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
